name: The myterious fortune teller
mes: Gira is a wandering hero in a new town who has just taken out a group of bandits. He goes around the city, looking for the guild. He had heard rumors about bad things happening in the town and didn't wish to stay around, unless there was an opportunity to make money that is. It had been a time for Gira and many things were on his mind. Saving princesses, defeating the demon queen, getting enough money... at least he could work things out one step at a time.

name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
"Ah, another curious soul approaches," the myterious fortune teller said with a sly tone, her thick white curtain bangs falling slightly over her black mask adorned with a purple spiral. The candles on the tattered blue cloth shimmered, casting eerie shadows on the various wooden signs etched with unreadable symbols.

The space was filled with a mysterious atmosphere, spooky and almost captivating to anyone who stumbled upon it. The purple crystal ball seated directly at the center of the table seemed to pulsate with a hypnotic glow, emitting spirals that would make any onlooker feel strangely serene.

"Come closer," she coaxed, her fingers making suggestive and fluid movements around the crystal ball. Her voice had a slavic accent, exotic and slightly menacing at the same time. "I can see answers in the mystic energies for those who seek."

Gira's skeptical expression did not escape her. Still, he stepped nearer, feeling an inexplicable pull toward the woman behind the table. This place felt more like an illusion than reality, a compelling uncertainty drawing him in.
